sentences.english: Such a theoretical device would have a zero ohm output impedance in series with the source.
sentences.chinese: 这种理论的设备将有一个与源系列零欧姆的输出阻抗。

sentences.english: This phenomenon appears even more striking in the simulation realization of non-linear negative impedance.
sentences.chinese: 这在非线性负阻抗的模拟实现中，更为突出。

sentences.english: At Futang hydropower station, the cylinder restricted surge tank is 31.
sentences.chinese: 福堂水电站圆筒阻抗式调压井工程开挖直径31。

sentences.english: The structures perform similarly to an object covered with the surface impedance.
sentences.chinese: 该结构能起到消除表面阻抗的作用。

sentences.english: AC impedance spectroscopy technique was applied to study the conductivity and its temperature dependance.
sentences.chinese: 以交流阻抗谱技术测定了电导率及其与温度的关系。

sentences.english: This investigation deals with the formation mechanism of tantalum anode oxidation membrane.
sentences.chinese: 用交流阻抗法对钽阳极氧化膜生成机理进行了研究。

sentences.english: None of the surveyed materials were found to be suitable for use as impedance matched specular radar absorbers.
sentences.chinese: 考察材料没有发现适用于镜面雷达吸收剂的阻抗匹配。

sentences.english: We have added 2-extra rows of grid plates to compensate for the new lower resistance of the stainless steel.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经增加了两排栅板来补偿新不锈钢板的低阻抗。

sentences.chinese: 从理论上推导出了岩心复阻抗与测量阻抗之间的关系。

sentences.chinese: 从理论上推导出了岩心复阻抗与测量阻抗之间的关系。

sentences.english: This result is applicable to the impedance matching of other RF power.
sentences.chinese: 这一结果同样适用于其它射频电源的阻抗匹配研究。

sentences.english: The setting of overreached impedance is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 还对超范围阻抗如何整定进行了讨论。

sentences.english: In addition, selection of dynamite type should satisfy impedance matching principle.
sentences.chinese: 另外根据药型的选择要满足阻抗匹配原则。

sentences.english: The reflection coefficient of an interface depends on the contrast in acoustic impedance of the rock on either side of the interface.
sentences.chinese: 界面的反射系数取决于界面两侧岩石的声阻抗差。

sentences.english: Studies the hypervelocity launch feature of graded-impedance flier-plates.
sentences.chinese: 研究波阻抗梯度飞片的超高速发射特性。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
